@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Aura]

A creature entering or starting its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:] save with a moderate DC for the nosferatu's level. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} and takes a -2 status penalty to saves made to resist diseases and remove the sickened condition for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Effect: Air of Sickness]
